nodes.text: Explosion decompression was the process where a being exposed to an unpressurized environment—usually when exposed to a vacuum—was rapidly crushed from an increase in pressure, and died. Skakoans wore a special suit to prevent this, as they were unable to survive in most environments. If this suit was ruptured, the Skakoan in question would instantly die.

Explosive decompression also occurred to starships traveling through hyperspace. The physics in hyperspace were unpredictable, and whereas a ship's hull typically exploded outward, a breached part of a ship could simply leave it in a seismic tug, eventually exiting hyperspace and reverting to realspace. When the Harbinger collided with the Omen just as the latter entered hyperspace in 5000 BBY, the Omen's armory and a part of its quarterdeck was torn away from the Sith dreadnaught by a seismic tug.
